name: Yāo Dāo Zhuàn
summary: Yōko-Densetsu is a narrative - rich text game with tabletop role - playing simulations. In the stormy Middle Earth, northern demons and power - hungry eunuchs run wild. Your choices shape the story. Meet like - minded people on your journey and forge your unique path.

name: Yāo Liàn Xī Yóu
summary: You, an ordinary college student, are unexpectedly reincarnated into another world, becoming the new "Golden Body" chosen by Jin Chanzi. Characters from "Journey to the West" suddenly reappear before you in the guise of women. To return to your original world, you must complete the mission entrusted to you by "Tathagata Buddha." Renew your bonds with various demons, undo the mistakes of the previous Golden Body, "Tang Sanzang," and retrace your journey westward, reshaping order and causality...
publishers: Běijīng Jīng Wén Jī Zào XìnxīJìshù Yǒuxiàngōngsī
